<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>When a new record for table rotation gets created, many business rules need to get executed. 
This script will make sure that all required business rules will get executed even during/after the install and upgrade process</description>
        <name>Table Rotation for  Click Metrics</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[// Make sure business rules are running after the insertion.

var session = gs.getSession();
var previous = session.setWorkflow(true);

var tableName = 'sys_cs_click_metrics';
var rotations = 7;
var duration = '1970-01-02 00:00:00'; // copied from the existing value. This means 1

var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_table_rotation');

gr.addQuery('name', tableName);
gr.query();

if(gr.next()) {
	gs.info(getScriptName()+'The table rotation for '+ tableName+' table already exists. No record will be created');
}
else {
	gr.setWorkflow(true);
	gr.setValue('name', tableName);
	gr.setValue('duration', duration);
	gr.setValue('type', 'rotate');
	gr.setValue('rotations', rotations);
	var sysId = gr.insert();

	gs.info(getScriptName()+'The table rotation for '+tableName+' is now created by the fix-script. sys_id='+sysId);
}

function getScriptName() {
	return 'Fix_Script:Table Rotation for Click Metrics:';
}
]]></script>
